name: Direct2 Text
tag_list: sms, texting--text-messaging, mobile, marketing, qr-codes, social-media
overview:
Direct2 Text is a mobile marketing provider that allows their clients bulk text messaging capabilities to directly reach their current and potential customers/clients/staff/members. We provide both self-service and managed services to accomodate every marketing level. Our in-house marketing team is dedicated to assisting and guiding all our clients in succeeding with their mobile campaigns and strategies.

Features for these applications: Text2Join, Text4Info, TextReplies, Text2Win, TextPolling/Voting, 2-way conversations, and many more

Please give us a call to chat and learn more about how we can increase your reach through mobile marketing.

Direct2 Team (877) 789-2010 or hello@direct2x.com
